mapper.sql: m.id, m.userID, m.lng, m.lat, m.cityID, m.addr, m.districtID, m.districtName, m.createBy, m.createTime, m.updateBy, m.updateTime, m.version, m.isDeleted, m.cityName

where 1=1 and m.id = #{condition.id} and m.userID = #{condition.userID} and m.lng = #{condition.lng} and m.lat = #{condition.lat} and m.cityID = #{condition.cityID} and m.addr = #{condition.addr} and m.districtID = #{condition.districtID} and m.districtName = #{condition.districtName} and m.createBy = #{condition.createBy} and m.createTime = #{condition.createTime} and m.updateBy = #{condition.updateBy} and m.updateTime = #{condition.updateTime} and m.version = #{condition.version} and m.isDeleted = #{condition.isDeleted} and m.cityName = #{condition.cityName}

where 1=1 and m.id = #{condition.id} and UPPER(m.userID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.userID}),'%')) and UPPER(m.lng) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.lng}),'%')) and UPPER(m.lat) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.lat}),'%')) and UPPER(m.cityID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.cityID}),'%')) and UPPER(m.addr) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.addr}),'%')) and UPPER(m.districtID) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.districtID}),'%')) and UPPER(m.districtName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.districtName}),'%')) and UPPER(m.createBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createBy}),'%')) and UPPER(m.createTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.createTime}),'%')) and UPPER(m.updateBy) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateBy}),'%')) and UPPER(m.updateTime) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.updateTime}),'%')) and UPPER(m.version) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.version}),'%')) and UPPER(m.isDeleted) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.isDeleted}),'%')) and UPPER(m.cityName) LIKE UPPER(CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{condition.cityName}),'%'))
mapper.update: update mylocaltion set userID=#{userID}, lng=#{lng}, lat=#{lat}, cityID=#{cityID}, addr=#{addr}, districtID=#{districtID}, districtName=#{districtName}, createBy=#{createBy}, createTime=#{createTime}, updateBy=#{updateBy}, updateTime=#{updateTime}, version=#{version}, isDeleted=#{isDeleted}, cityName=#{cityName}, where id=#{id} and version = #{version}-1
mapper.select: select from mylocaltion m where m.id = #{id} and m.isDeleted = false
